main.name: Rennel Ongcoy
main.description: experienced on various levels of the tech stack from Embedded C/C++ on Linux to Web API with NodeJS.
main.bio: Hi! I'm Rennel Ongcoy. You can call me Eli. I am currently working as a Software Engineer here in Yokohama, Japan. Built from the ground up, I have started my 5+ years of software engineering journey from the hardware side of things. In my university days, I have studied different electronics and communications systems. Over time, software was incorporated more and I found it cool to interact with things in the physical world!
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Electronics and Communications Engineer

projects.title: Random Walker
projects.category: A C++ application to perform Random Walk on a bounded two-dimensional Qt-based virtual environment

projects.title: Zugzwang
projects.category: A Chess game recording system using Python3, OpenCV, and TensorFlow Lite on a Raspberry Pi

projects.title: ROS2 Examples
projects.category: Examples using ROS 2 for the Packt video course "ROS 2 - New Features". Updated for ROS 2 Foxy Fitzroy

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Rennel Ongcoy must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
